resources.string: Mapping the path to a healthier mind!
Anonymously, your responses will help us map and assist our employees in having a good work environment.
The password must have at least 6 characters
Based on your answers, we will monitor your emotional state!
Shall we proceed to the questions?
This helps us understand how you feel!
Illustration of a woman in a white lab coat, smiling.
How do you rate your workload?
Does your workload affect your quality of life?
Do you work beyond your regular hours?
Have you experienced symptoms such as insomnia, irritability, or extreme fatigue?
Do you feel that your mental health impairs your productivity at work?
How is your relationship with your boss on a scale of 1 to 5? (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
How is your relationship with your co-workers on a scale of 1 to 5? (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
I feel I am treated with respect by my co-workers. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
I can relate in a healthy and collaborative way with my team. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
I feel free to express my opinions without fear of retaliation. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
I feel welcomed and part of the team where I work. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
I feel there is a spirit of cooperation among colleagues. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
I receive clear and objective guidance on my activities and responsibilities. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
I feel I can communicate openly with my leadership. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
Important information circulates efficiently within the company. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
I have clarity about the goals and expected results from me. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
My leadership shows interest in my well-being at work. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
My leadership is available to listen to me when needed. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
I feel comfortable reporting problems or difficulties to my leader. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
My leadership recognizes my deliveries and efforts. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
There is trust and transparency in the relationship with my leadership. (Where 01 - bad and 05 - Great)
You have completed the daily survey!

Recommendation of the day for you!
Watch movies and series with friends, family and enjoy going out!
On this screen, we have the weekly summary of our colleagues\' emotional evolution for better activity control.
